author: Syvolc
message:
Thank you for this !

Since a long time we need this reborn for each new french user we looking for information about KDE.

author: sinma
message:
Hi,

I’m very happy to see that website reborn (the old website was getting really old). And all your choices make sense; the website is really fast and clean.

I just wonder why you write «La communauté» where other links have no article: «Articles», «Espaces de travail», etc.

So, good job and thank you! ^^
